name: Dabbag
description:
Dubbag is a #LDJAM 32 game, the theme for it is "an unconventional weapon", That's why you shoot teddy bears, and your enemies shoot rubber ducks.

Therefore the main idea of the game is that Ducks Are Bad Bears Are Good(got that game title now?), shoot the guys dominated by ducks until everyone is happy with bears on the hand! feel free to comment, feedback is more than welcome! If you enjoyed please rate the game on the LD page.

--Controls--

W and S or Arrows - Move

Left click - Shoot a bear
